name: fusou-workflow
description: Cloudflare Workflows for FUSOU data compaction

scripts.schema:list:local: wrangler d1 execute dev_kc_battle_index --local --command 'SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type="table"'
scripts.schema:list:remote: wrangler d1 execute dev_kc_battle_index --remote --command 'SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type="table"'
